issue.title: www.crosswordsolver.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: I just added tinyShield userscript v1.3.61 as suggested by Adguard, but the issue remains.

issue.title: devuploads.com: site breakage/anti adblock

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9.13

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website, Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://devuploads.com/8dbqsg2wcglh

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Protect from DPI, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests

### Add your comment and screenshots

cant download files without disabling adguard app completely. i tried at first to just add the site to my allow list. that does nothing it still detects adguard. i get a totally different screen that shows me the download link if i disable adguard. if i dont it just says checking your download and is stuck there. watch the below videos to understand.

1. Without adguard app enabled:

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/babac03c-a836-4436-81f7-f3b6f1b3ae7f


2. with adguard app enabled

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e6306ea2-657a-4040-a95f-d3e7636a9962

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

However, please read [the first post](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199624#issue-2884986856).

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

comment.body:
>Problem pojawił się po uruchomieniu logowania dwuetapowego za pomocą klucza fizycznego Yubi. Przy włączonym rozszerzeniu nie ma możliwości zalogowania do poczty wp.pl po wyłączeniu dodatku strona działa poprawnie.

Nie posiadam klucza Yubi, więc nie jestem w stanie sprawdzić tego z kluczem, ale zauważyłem, że podobny problem z logowaniem występuje w przypadku użycia kodów do logowania.
Dodałem regułę która powinna to naprawić, mam nadzieję, że rozwiąże to również problem z kluczem sprzętowym.

 [https://web.awto.com.br/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.awto.com.br%2F)

comment.body:
AdGuard used to block ads on almost every app, but it’s becoming hard for you guys to admit there’s an issue. Perhaps it’s because only a small group of users are experiencing it, which is why there seems to be a lack of interest in investigating further. Just take a look at this screenshot: the filters fail to update, and the saved data is only 9.87 MB, when it used to be around 700–800 MB daily. This clearly indicates that something is wrong. I don’t know exactly how AdGuard works technically, but I do remember the statistics and the relief it provided when it used to work properly.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/18542ab7-3179-4f66-90bb-95860706a40c)

issue.title: tracking from digidip.net on dealabs.com

labels.name: T: Analytics
labels.description: Collecting analytics and tracking users

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Some sites (such as dealabs.com, to quote one I know) track by passing each clicks through advertising agencies.
With the new version of the $urltransform tool, you can finally “clean up” the links.

Here are a few examples:

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lycamobile.fr%2Ffr%2Fbundle%2Fforfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb%2F&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1714412352

to gives https://www.lycamobile.fr/fr/bundle/forfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb/

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cdiscount.com%2Finformatique%2Fssd%2Fssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m%2Ff-10703-sam8806095575650.html&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Deffiliation.com&ref=ppr-fr-1714418097

to give https://www.cdiscount.com/informatique/ssd/ssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m/f-10703-sam8806095575650.html

### Proposed solution

```
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3A/:/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%2F/\//
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3F/?/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3D/=/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net.*url=([^&]*).*/\$1/
```

The first 4 rules are only for decoding special characters, as the $urltransform tool unfortunately can't do this ([yet](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1915)). When it does, these rules could be removed.

KR,





### Additional information

_No response_

commits.message: Fix #197963 tracking from digidip.net on dealabs.com

comment.body:
My bad, I thought that it's only caused by `Hide your Referrer from third-parties` and I didn't realize that `Block third-party Authorization header` option also breaks it.
Could you please add following rules:
```adblock
@@||api.schale.network^$stealth=referrer|3p-auth
@@||auth.schale.network^$stealth=referrer|3p-auth
```
to user rules and then check if issue still occurs?
@piquark6046 The rule is blocking their self-links too. Please avoid such rules unless you're really sure they're necessary.

@virp Не повторяется. 
Если проблема именно с Хромом, включите отладочное логирование, повторите проблему и напишите на support@adguard.com Также можно написать сюда (логи - через поддержку). Укажите точную версию хрома, и желательно приложить скриншот дерева процессов Хрома (Вид => Иерархически).

comment.body:
iOS for apps is a black box. To filter sites we use Safari Content Clocker  API - it is a black box for us. We simply corvert the filters into a format it understands and give them to the Content Blocking API. It is impossible to control how this API functions. Filtering can break down for no apparent reason. Therefore, we periodically advise you to re-enable AdGuard in iOS settings and update filters. The second method of filtering is Advanced Protection, for applying rules that are not natively supported by iOS. It doesn't work perfectly either, as it's a workaround. 
The last method is DNS filtering. In this case it is only possible to block advertising/tracking domains. But in the whole system. If the main domain of a service is used for advertising, it is impossible to block such advertising by DNS (for applications, this is the only possible option, unlike Android, where there is more freedom of action)
Most likely, some of the apps (social network apps) didn't show ads before, and when they determined that it WORTH showing ads to you, the ads turned on. For example, I rarely open Facebook and there are no ads with my account.

issue.title: tracking from digidip.net on dealabs.com

labels.name: T: Analytics
labels.description: Collecting analytics and tracking users

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Some sites (such as dealabs.com, to quote one I know) track by passing each clicks through advertising agencies.
With the new version of the $urltransform tool, you can finally “clean up” the links.

Here are a few examples:

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lycamobile.fr%2Ffr%2Fbundle%2Fforfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb%2F&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1714412352

to gives https://www.lycamobile.fr/fr/bundle/forfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb/

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cdiscount.com%2Finformatique%2Fssd%2Fssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m%2Ff-10703-sam8806095575650.html&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Deffiliation.com&ref=ppr-fr-1714418097

to give https://www.cdiscount.com/informatique/ssd/ssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m/f-10703-sam8806095575650.html

### Proposed solution

```
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3A/:/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%2F/\//
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3F/?/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3D/=/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net.*url=([^&]*).*/\$1/
```

The first 4 rules are only for decoding special characters, as the $urltransform tool unfortunately can't do this ([yet](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1915)). When it does, these rules could be removed.

KR,





### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body: I appreciate your detailed response, @Alex-302 . I understand your point. My experience, however, is that AdGuard suddenly stopped working on every app I use, and this has been the case for just a month or two. If I had experienced slow pop-ups of ads on different apps, I would have agreed with your point about "they determining that it's WORTH showing ads to you." However, my experience still leads me to believe that there is an issue with AdGuard, and it isn’t entirely as ineffective as it seems right now.

issue.title: ranking.net

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: ranking.net

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
> > дополнительно заблокировал запросы яндекса от мангалиба
> 
>  А какие запросы у вас? Я кое-что блокировал, должно блокироваться без дополнительных правил.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d4ba7e87-0193-492c-88ce-1a77a85da72c) 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/27aa8241-29e4-4326-bc8c-482dbb07c772)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/aba033b4-3be1-4f98-8c9d-480a0a7a537f)

Вот такое, по факту весь яндекс для либы.
Без этого правила реклама всё равно вылезала.

Т.е. по факту, чтобы реклама пропала, потребовалось обновление фильтров до последней версии + это дополнительное правило.

Без последней версии фильтров, но с правилом - реклама была.
С последней версией фильтров, но без правила - реклама тоже есть.

issue.title: downdetector.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?
